name: ksd-wallet
description: KSD Wallet browser extension: supports account management, transaction signing, asset indexing, and network interaction
author: li

scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run format --check
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run check
scripts.build:chrome: vite build && node build.cjs chrome && npm run bump && npm run check:manifest && npm run zip:chrome && npm run changelog && npm run git:commit
scripts.build:edge: vite build && node build.cjs edge && npm run bump && npm run check:manifest && npm run zip:edge && npm run changelog && npm run git:commit
scripts.build:firefox: vite build && node build.cjs firefox && npm run bump && npm run check:manifest && npm run zip:firefox && npm run changelog && npm run git:commit
scripts.release: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:edge && npm run build:firefox && npm run check:zip && npm run changelog && npm run git:commit
scripts.postversion: echo 'Version bumped and ready for release'
scripts.postbuild: echo 'Build completed and manifest copied to dist/'
